resources.string: Hold your device always in front of your body
SmartNavi was not able to get an initial position.\nPlease enable internet or GPS and restart SmartNavi,\nor contact our support: smartnavi@2imba.de
SmartNavi is the first GPS independent and step-based navigation-app for Android.
SmartNavi is still in development.\nFeel free to contact us:\nsmartnavi@2imba.de
Please enter your body height, so that your step length can be determined.
Thanks to Madeliniz for the SmartNavi Logo:\nhttp://madeliniz.deviantart.com
Touch and hold the map to get extra options. So you can set your exact start position.
The body height is an invalid value. Only numbers allowed.
No Result. Check internet connection and try again.

Support SmartNavi by sending anonymous usage data. This data will help us to improve SmartNavi. The data are about: device type, sensor equipment and usage of features. The data is completely anonymous. No positions and no private information will be transmitted. You can deactivate usage data sending at every time in settings. Thank you for your support!
Please enable location getting in settings.
Could not get route information. Please try again later.
It seems that you like SmartNavi. :) \nYour rating would be great support for us!

SmartNavi recognizes steps by using accelerometer and magnetic-field-sensor data. Every step changes the position in the corresponding direction. Internal error correction guarantees a durable accuracy. The startposition will be located by using either GPS or UMTS/Wifi/GSM locationing. By using internal sensors instead of GPS, SmartNavi can save up to 70% energy and therefore battery life.

Unfortunately your device does not seem to have a magnetic field sensor (compass). SmartNavi can not work without that.
More information on our website:
www.smartnavi.mobi

Unfortunately SmartNavi can not initialize your accelerometer. 
For support you can contact us via our website:
www.smartnavi.mobi
Your step length is calculated by using your height
Exports the route you walk in a GPX-file on your SD-Card
SmartNavi can provide location data for other apps.
Use this feature to navigate with other apps stepbased and energy-saving.
SmartNavi is now running in background
No results were found for your request.
More Info about the specific data can be found under About
Enable GPS to get a better initial position.\nAfter getting your initial position SmartNavi works independent from GPS! :)
Corrects your position regularly with GPS
GPX-File will be created in Folder \"smartnavi\"

We are interested in your opinion.
Please take our survey. It will just take 2min and will help us a lot to improve SmartNavi to fit your needs.

In this early beta you can see the integration of Open Street Map. You can change to OSM in the settings. Routing for OSM is not implemented until now, but will come very soon. Stay tuned and thank you for your asistance!

PS: Drop by at the Google+ Beta-Test Community next time. ;)
